servinfo.title: Precautions in Diagnosing Troubles (With Headlight Auto Leveling System)

item.ptxt: Be sure to read Precautions for Electrical Circuit Service before inspection and observe what is written there.
Replacement of height sensor and headlight auto leveling control module

When height sensor and/or headlight auto leveling control module is replaced with new one, perform initialization of headlight auto leveling system according to Initialization of Headlight Auto Leveling System .
